game.name: Train Simulator: Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A rich history of modernisation and refinement awaits you on the Woodhead Electric Railway – see for yourself how advances in power and route design gave new life to a struggling operation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rich history of modernisation and refinement awaits you on the Woodhead Electric Railway – see for yourself how advances in power and route design gave new life to a struggling operation.
